generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, where vehicles are driving and pedestrians are walking on the sidewalk adjacent to it.
- sidewalk: The area where pedestrians are walking, bordered by curbs and trees, is clearly a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible in the background and along the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves are present along the sidewalk and street.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing clear and blue.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk, including men and women of various ages.
- car: A black car (Skoda) is prominently visible in the middle of the road, and other cars can be seen in the background.
- pole: Traffic light poles and other vertical poles are visible along the sidewalk and street.
- traffic light: A green traffic light is visible hanging above the sidewalk.
- fence: Orange and white construction barriers are visible on the left side of the road.
- traffic sign: A small yellow traffic sign is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
